programme.title: Adnan Sempit 2
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Adnan, seorang penunggang motosikal jalanan yang yatim piatu dan dijaga oleh bibinya. Di pihak lain, Nadia dilahirkan dalam keluarga yang kaya dan kini memiliki pekerjaan yang stabil. Kedua-dua individu yang berlatarbelakangkan dunia yang berbeza ini akhirnya bertemu secara kebetulan dan terjalin hubungan antara mereka.

programme.title: Budak Magik Ep 15 Ep15
programme.desc: Johan dan Suraya telah pulang ke Kuala Lumpur. Wan pula menghadiri jemputan kenduri. Sehinggakan, rakannya, memberinya peluang untuk memulakan balik hidupnya di rumah terpencil keluarganya. Disitu, Hariz mula dapat merasakan pelbagai kes yang aneh dan misteri terjadi disekelilingnya. Dalam pada masa yang sama, Budi mengawal setiap pergerakan Hariz. Sebelum Titik Noktah membawakan genre thriller, misteri yang diselit dengan penampilan wajah - wajah pelakon iaitu Aiman Hakim Redza, Puteri Balqis, dan Noki K-Clique. Diselubungi dengan misteri sehingga menimbulkan huru hara di sekitar perkelilingan orang - orang yang disayangi Hariz.

programme.title: Terowong Ep 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Bertajuk "Penunggu" memaparkan sebuah lagi cerita seram yang berlatar belakangkan Terowong. Ianya mengisahkan seorang lelaki Amin bertemu dan di ganggu seorang wanita tua (penunggu terowong) yang menakutkan di dalam terowong. Dia mengigau diganggu perempuan tua (Penunggu) . Suatu hari ibunya terjumpa sehelai baju berdarah di dalam biliknya. Amin telah merayu kepada nenek tua (penunggu) itu supaya tidak mengganggunya lagi. Nenek (penunggu) itu berkata bahawa itu adalah tempatnya dan tidak sabar menunggu Amin. Amin tidak tidur selama seminggu kerana takut di ganggu oleh penunggu tersebut dan tubuhnya menjadi tidak terurus, busuk dan pucat. Suatu hari nenek itu menjelma dihadapan ibunya dan mengatakan akan mengambil Amin. Penunggu itu sayangkan Amin dan ibunya berkeras untuk menolong Amir walaupun Amir tidak mahu ibunya mendapatkan bantuan khidmat bomoh. Jin (penunggu) itu memarahi ibu Amin kerana mengganggunya dengan memanggil bomoh. Penunggu tersebut juga mengganggu Nadia kekasih Amin serta melarangnya mendekati Amin. Suatu hari ibu dan tunang Amin menjumpai Amin mati dilanggar kereta di dalam terowong itu. Nenek itu membawa Amin pergi dari terowong tersebut dengan memimpinya.

programme.title: Terowong Ep 4 Ep4
programme.desc: Bertajuk 'Diari' mengisahkan seorang pelajar bernama Maya dalam keadaan sedih berseorangan dan berkata-kata pada diri sendiri, mengapa semua orang membencinya. Semasa Maya sedang bercakap-cakap bersendirian di dalam terowong tersebut, ada sebuah diari telah berkata-kata dengannya dan berjanji akan menolongnya. Maya yang berdendam dengan Yana dan semua itu tercatat didalam diarinya. Maya sudah berjanji dengan puaka yang berada di dalam terowong tersebut, bahawa dia akan memberikan atau menhadiahkan seorang mangsa sebagai habuan (makanan) kepada puaka tersebut kerana menolongnya menjadi cantik. Maya mahu membalas dendam terhadap Yana dan meminta pertolongan dengan dairi berpuaka. Hantu yang menjadi kawan Maya juga memusuhi Yana dan Maya telah berubah menjadi lebih cantik dan sedikit sombong. Kawan-kawan Yana telah meninggalkan Yana untuk berkawan dengan Maya. Kawan Mustafa, Yus berkata bahawa Maya itu berkawan dengan syaitan dan serta menasihatkan Mustafa supaya menjaga dirinya agar tidak menjadi mangsa bunuh Maya. Yus telah menjadi mangsa kedua hantu tersebut, setelah Maya berdendam dan marah terhadap Yus. Setelah Maya terlihat Mustafa berdua-dua dalam sebuah restoran dan Maya nampak marah kepada Mustafa. Akhirnya Mustafa telah menjadi mangsa hantu tersebut, Maya telah pulangkan semula diari itu kepada hantu atau penunggu terowong tersebut kerana kecewa dan puaka itu telah membunuh kekasihnya Mustafa. Pada masa yang sama Yana pula telah mengambil alih menjaga 'diari' puaka tersebut

programme.title: Taxi 4
programme.desc: Tidak bernasib baik, kikir, tetapi menawan, detektif PD Marseille milien Coutant-Kerbalec mesti membantu komisioner Gibert yang lebih teruk daripada Clouseau menjaga penjenayah Belgium yang terkenal sebagai bahaya sama seperti - dan ditawan seperti Hannibal Lector. Kawan sejuk milien, pemandu teksi Daniel Morales, pada mulanya hanya bersetuju untuk menjaga anak-anak lelaki kawan mereka, kerana isteri milien, Petra, sedang menjalankan misi rahsia. Tetapi tidak lama kemudian, penjenayah Belgium itu melarikan diri, dan semasa mengejarnya, rakan-rakan itu tersandung pada satu perampokan bank dan sebuah vila megah milik raja dadah, di mana babak akhir yang hebat berlaku.

programme.title: Takut Ke Tak
programme.desc: Lima pelajar jurusan filem merancang untuk melakukan penggambaran di sebuah rumah berhantu, namun satu demi satu kejadian yang sama seperti kebanyakan filem seram berlaku kepada mereka lalu mereka perlu membuat keputusan penting takut ke tak?

programme.title: Double Barrel
programme.desc: Mengenai pasangan muda yang miskin bekerja sebagai pembunuh upahan sehingga mereka diberi tugasan terbaru untuk menghapuskan abang isteri sendiri yang memaksa mereka lari dan bersembunyi daripada kumpulan itu untuk menyelamatkan diri dan bayi mereka.

programme.title: Sebelum Titik Noktah Ep 5 Ep5

programme.title: Plan B Ep 5 Ep5
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Khai kalah dalam perlumbaan kereta "drift". Dia tidak mampu membayar wang taruhan sebanyak RM50 ribu lalu mengadai kereta lumbanya. Di rumah Khai terperangkap ketika dia cuba membuka peti besi wang bapanya. Dia dihalau dari rumah. Kemudian Khai berjaya meminjam wang daripada rakannya, Mica dan menebus kembali keretanya yang tergadai itu. Khai tidak pulang ke rumah hanya tidur dalam kereta yang dipakirnya di tepi jalanraya.

programme.title: Bini-bini Ku Gangster
programme.desc: Manja dan Herry adalah sepasang suami isteri yang sangat romantik dan saling sayang menyayangi. Tanpa disedari oleh Herry, Manja adalah ketua kumpulan kepada sebuah geng gengster di Kuala Lumpur. Manja bengang lalu menghantar orang-orangnya memukul Mat Saja.

programme.title: Howl
programme.desc: Apabila penumpang di dalam kereta api diserang oleh makhluk, mereka mesti bersatu untuk bertahan sehingga pagi.

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Larian Terakhir
programme.desc: Haziq, seorang anak tunggal kepada Mariam yang mempunyai bakat dalam larian pantas, sering berhadapan dengan dugaan kehidupan sehinggakan dia terpaksa meninggalkan ibunya yang sakit. Tanpa disedarinya, pertemuannya dengan Jalal telah memerangkapnya dalam sebuah sindiket jenayah. Walaupun Haziq dijanjikan peluang untuk memperbaiki hidupnya, Amelia sentiasa mengawasi setiap pergerakannya dengan teliti. Larian Terakhir adalah sebuah filem yang menggabungkan genre aksi dan sukan dengan penampilan pelakon-pelakon seperti Fattah Amin, Amyra Rosli, dan Fahrin Ahmad, di mana setiap larian akan sampai ke kemuncaknya.

programme.title: Kembar Siam
programme.desc: Berwajah serupa namun merupakan dua orang yang berbeza. Dua jejaka dengan kehidupan yang berlainan - seorang ingin menjadi pelakon filem terkenal namun gagal manakala seorang lagi merupakan pelakon filem terkenal namun mengimpikan kebebasan. Mereka bertemu dan merancang sesuatu yang malangnya hanya telah menimbulkan kekacauan dan kekeliruan orang sekeliling.

programme.title: Tak Ori Tapi Ok
programme.desc: Keinginan seorang pengarah filem yang ingin menghasilkan naskhah baru. Yassin mahu melakukan kemunculan semula setelah sekian lama menemui jalan buntu dalam kerjayanya. Menemui seseorang yang mahu membiayai projek terbarunya, dia pun mula mencari pelakon-pelakon untuk membintanginya. Pelbagai rintangan dihadapinya dalam mencari pelakon yang boleh meniru gaya seperti P.Ramlee.

programme.title: Bumbung Kiah Lantai Tipah
programme.desc: Nor merupakan seorang pemandu teksi yang sudah berkahwin dua . Rumah isteri pertama dan keduanya hanya dipisahkan oleh satu tingkat namun isteri pertamanya Tipah, tidak tahu bahawa Kiah yang tinggal di atas rumahnya adalah madunya begitu juga Kiah. Mereka yang dahulunya sahabat mula bertengkar setelah mengetahui akan hal tersebut.

programme.title: Gemerlapan
programme.desc: Mimi mengejutkan ramai pelajar di sebuah kolej berprestij kerana menjadi seorang penggemar muzik dangdut yang tegar. Nel, salah seorang pelajar di situ menganggap muzik dangdut kekampungan dan mereka berdua sering bertengkar kerana hal tersebut. Tetapi tanpa disedari, Nel adalah Mr X yang selama ini merupakan peminat rahsia Mimi dalam diam.

programme.title: Belum Berakhir
programme.desc: Awini seorang penyanyi kelab malam yang pernah menjalin hubungan dengan Fikri kembali menghantui hidup Fikri setelah lelaki itu meninggalkannya setelah berumah tangga dengan Dona. Pelbagai helah dilakukan Awini untuk menjejaskan hubungan Fikri dengan Dona agar Fikri kembali kepadanya.

programme.title: Anak Abah
programme.desc: Zarith yang masih menuntut di luar negara terpaksa pulang ke tanah air untuk menjadi pengerusi dan menguruskan resort peninggalan ayahnya yang meninggal secara tiba-tiba akibat serangan jantung.Farhan yang merupakan salah seorang eksekutif resort tersebut tidak bersetuju di atas perlantikan tersebut kerana usia Zarith yang masih terlalu muda dan kurang pengalaman.Mujur ada Pak Din,pembantu peribadi arwah ayahnya dan Nina, setiausaha ayahnya yang selalu mendorong dan menyokong Zarith.

programme.title: Tuah
programme.desc: Datuk Shaari dan Shahira diselamatkan oleh seorang lelaki yang mendakwa bahawa dirinya Hang Tuah, seorang pahlawan Melayu di abad ke-15. Meragui kisahnya, mereka membawanya melakukan pemeriksaan fizikal dan mental di hospital, lama-kelamaan Shahira mula mempercayainya. Tuah secara ajaibnya telah dibawa ke zaman moden dan mula mempelajari apa yang terjadi pada masa lalu. Akhirnya, Tuah pulang semula ke tempat asalnya dan mula membetulkan keadaan.

programme.title: Kasih Suami Isteri
programme.desc: Azman dan Akil merupakan rakan sekerja dan juga rakan serumah. Setelah Azman berkahwin dengan Syanie, Akil menjadi segan untuk tinggal serumah kerana tidak mahu menganggu mereka namun Syanie menjodohkan Akil dengan sahabtnya Sally lalu mereka tinggal serumah bersama-sama. Pelbagai kisah menarik dalam kedua-dua pasangan ini dalam melayari bahtera perkahwinan.

programme.title: Gila - Gila Pengantin
programme.desc: Aliah seorang gadis yang ingin berkahwin tetapi mempunyai satu fobia dimana dia takut untuk bersanding dia atas pelamin setelah apa yang terjadi keatas dirinya semasa dia kecil. Dalam masa yang sama, Johari juga mempunyai masalah yang sama dengan Aliah. Mereka telah bertemu di dalam dunia cyber dan beramah mesra dengan perbualan masing-masing sehingga hari ini. Rupa-rupanya ada kenangan di antara mereka berdua. Namun mereka bakal berkahwin dengan pasangan yang berlainan dari mereka dan kedua-duanya perlu bersanding di atas pelamin ketika majlis perkahwinan.

programme.title: Alahai Manisnya Madu
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Zul yang berkahwin dua dan cuba untuk menyembunyikan perihal tersebut dari pengetahun Zian, isteri pertamanya dan Nani, isteri keduanya. Zul berkahwin dengan kedua-dua wanita tersebut hanya selang seminggu sahaja kerana terpikat dengan kedua dua wanita tersebut dalam masa yang sama.

programme.title: Kembar Siam
programme.desc: Berwajah serupa namun merupakan dua orang yang berbeza. Dua jejaka dengan kehidupan yang berlainan - seorang ingin menjadi pelakon filem terkenal namun gagal manakala seorang lagi merupakan pelakon filem terkenal namun mengimpikan kebebasan. programme.title: Gemerlapan
programme.desc: Mimi mengejutkan ramai pelajar di sebuah kolej berprestij kerana menjadi seorang penggemar muzik dangdut yang tegar. Nel, salah seorang pelajar di situ menganggap muzik dangdut kekampungan dan mereka berdua sering bertengkar kerana hal tersebut. Tetapi tanpa disedari, Nel adalah Mr X yang selama ini merupakan peminat rahsia Mimi dalam diam.

programme.title: Belum Berakhir
programme.desc: Awini seorang penyanyi kelab malam yang pernah menjalin hubungan dengan Fikri kembali menghantui hidup Fikri setelah lelaki itu meninggalkannya setelah berumah tangga dengan Dona. Pelbagai helah dilakukan Awini untuk menjejaskan hubungan Fikri dengan Dona agar Fikri kembali kepadanya.

programme.title: Tuah
programme.desc: Datuk Shaari dan Shahira diselamatkan oleh seorang lelaki yang mendakwa bahawa dirinya Hang Tuah, seorang pahlawan Melayu di abad ke-15. Meragui kisahnya, mereka membawanya melakukan pemeriksaan fizikal dan mental di hospital, lama-kelamaan Shahira mula mempercayainya. Tuah secara ajaibnya telah dibawa ke zaman moden dan mula mempelajari apa yang terjadi pada masa lalu. Akhirnya, Tuah pulang semula ke tempat asalnya dan mula membetulkan keadaan.

programme.title: Gila - Gila Pengantin
programme.desc: Aliah seorang gadis yang ingin berkahwin tetapi mempunyai satu fobia dimana dia takut untuk bersanding dia atas pelamin setelah apa yang terjadi keatas dirinya semasa dia kecil. Dalam masa yang sama, Johari juga mempunyai masalah yang sama dengan Aliah. Mereka telah bertemu di dalam dunia cyber dan beramah mesra dengan perbualan masing-masing sehingga hari ini. Rupa-rupanya ada kenangan di antara mereka berdua. Namun mereka bakal berkahwin dengan pasangan yang berlainan dari mereka dan kedua-duanya perlu bersanding di atas pelamin ketika majlis perkahwinan.

programme.title: Kasih Suami Isteri
programme.desc: Azman dan Akil merupakan rakan sekerja dan juga rakan serumah. Setelah Azman berkahwin dengan Syanie, Akil menjadi segan untuk tinggal serumah kerana tidak mahu menganggu mereka namun Syanie menjodohkan Akil dengan sahabtnya Sally lalu mereka tinggal serumah bersama-sama. Pelbagai kisah menarik dalam kedua-dua pasangan ini dalam melayari bahtera perkahwinan.

programme.title: Alahai Manisnya Madu
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Zul yang berkahwin dua dan cuba untuk menyembunyikan perihal tersebut dari pengetahun Zian, isteri pertamanya dan Nani, isteri keduanya. Zul berkahwin dengan kedua-dua wanita tersebut hanya selang seminggu sahaja kerana terpikat dengan kedua dua wanita tersebut dalam masa yang sama.

programme.title: Kembar Siam
programme.desc: Berwajah serupa namun merupakan dua orang yang berbeza. Dua jejaka dengan kehidupan yang berlainan - seorang ingin menjadi pelakon filem terkenal namun gagal manakala seorang lagi merupakan pelakon filem terkenal namun mengimpikan kebebasan. Mereka bertemu dan merancang sesuatu yang malangnya hanya telah menimbulkan kekacauan dan kekeliruan orang sekeliling.

programme.title: Anak Abah
programme.desc: Zarith yang masih menuntut di luar negara terpaksa pulang ke tanah air untuk menjadi pengerusi dan menguruskan resort peninggalan ayahnya yang meninggal secara tiba-tiba akibat serangan jantung.Farhan yang merupakan salah seorang eksekutif resort tersebut tidak bersetuju di atas perlantikan tersebut kerana usia Zarith yang masih terlalu muda dan kurang pengalaman.Mujur ada Pak Din,pembantu peribadi arwah ayahnya dan Nina, setiausaha ayahnya yang selalu mendorong dan menyokong Zarith.

programme.title: Tak Ori Tapi Ok
programme.desc: Keinginan seorang pengarah filem yang ingin menghasilkan naskhah baru. Yassin mahu melakukan kemunculan semula setelah sekian lama menemui jalan buntu dalam kerjayanya. Menemui seseorang yang mahu membiayai projek terbarunya, dia pun mula mencari pelakon-pelakon untuk membintanginya. Pelbagai rintangan dihadapinya dalam mencari pelakon yang boleh meniru gaya seperti P.Ramlee.

programme.title: Belum Berakhir

programme.title: Bumbung Kiah Lantai Tipah
programme.desc: Nor merupakan seorang pemandu teksi yang sudah berkahwin dua . Rumah isteri pertama dan keduanya hanya dipisahkan oleh satu tingkat namun isteri pertamanya Tipah, tidak tahu bahawa Kiah yang tinggal di atas rumahnya adalah madunya begitu juga Kiah. Mereka yang dahulunya sahabat mula bertengkar setelah mengetahui akan hal tersebut.

programme.desc: 8 dancers from different dance style, background and age group came together,broaden their horizon by challenging themselves to experience and learn a wholedifferent genre of dance.

programme.title: My Journey With Nature Ep11
programme.desc: Pengembaraan seorang wanita ke kawasan pendalaman yang belum diterokai diceritakan dalam "My Journey with Nature", yang menampilkan tarikan pelancongan alam semula jadi.

programme.title: Kubah Borneo Ep10
programme.desc: Kubah Borneo will bring viewers a closer look of mosques located at several districts in Borneo Island. The host will visit a mosque at a different location to learn and share the history of the mosque.

programme.title: Main Uti Kelia Ep3
programme.desc: Dokumentari dalam Bahasa Iban yang membawa nostalgia mengenai permainan dan aktiviti golongan remaja & dewasa kaum Iban pada zaman dahulu dan sebelum wujudnya permainan & teknologi moden seperti sekarang

programme.title: Decimal Point S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Weekly business show is set to become your trusted source for all things business, economics, and current affairs. Your gateway to making informed decisions in today's fast-paced business environment.

programme.title: HITS Ep4
programme.desc: Rancangan infotainment HITS adalah program 30 minit/episod setiap minggu yang menghadirkan berita, tren, dan kisah-kisah menarik dari dunia hiburan.

programme.title: Ajaib Ep8
programme.desc: Dunia koma Jasmin dan mimpi Maliq mempertemukan mereka dalam satu dunia lain, yang akhirnya membuatkan mereka menjalinkan cinta. Pertemuan di dunia fantasi, akhirnya menyatukan mereka di dunia realiti

programme.title: Tanah Syurga Ep9
programme.desc: Kepulangan Andy ke Sarawak demi menjaga ibunya yang sakit disamping mengusahakan tanah pusaka peninggalan arwah ayah telah menimbulkan reaksi negatif abangnya, Jamal.

programme.title: (L) TVS Pagi
programme.desc: TVS Pagi membawakan perkembangan menyeluruh dari dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Ride Your Story Ep2
programme.desc: Docu-series to show case a different aspect of Borneo from the back of a bike, ridden by 3 biker chicks. There will be real encounters with bad weather, mechanical breakdowns and difficult terrains.

programme.title: (DL) World News
programme.desc: Delivers timely and in-depth coverage of key global events, focusing on international politics, economics, and societal changes, with a spotlight on the latest developments impacting the world today.

programme.title: TVS Fillers Ep1
programme.desc: TVS Fillers delivers quick, engaging segments on Sarawakian culture, local trends, and more, keeping viewers entertained between programs.

programme.title: Sesalan Terakhir
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Natasha merupakan anak tidak sah taraf. Hidupnya tidak seperti orang lain. Dia dipinggirkan orang kampung kerana sikap ibunya, Auni, yang sering menjalinkan hubungan dengan lelaki kaya kerana ingin memiliki kekayaan. Puas Natasha menasihati ibunya supaya kembali ke jalan yang benar.

programme.title: The Dream Boyz
programme.desc: Lapan rakan dari sebuah kelab drama cuba menyelamatkan masyarakat mereka dan merealisasikan impian mereka untuk mengeluarkan filem mereka pada masa yang sama.

programme.title: Love Affair
programme.desc: Tee sering bertengkar dengan isterinya Thom, yang baru sahaja dikahwininya. Dia memutuskan untuk terbang ke London. Disana, dia jatuh cinta dengan seorang gadis muda dan cantik bernama Jao Noi. Thom pula mengandung tetapi tidak mahu membebankan Tee. Apakah kesudahan dari cerita ini?

programme.title: Tmo Gila Tak Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Gila Tak Cinta

programme.title: Balasan Untuk Ayah Dzalim
programme.desc: (Toni) Ayah kepada Rahma, menganggap bahawa Rahma sebagai anak pembawa malang. Ini kerana isterinya meninggal dunia saat melahirkan Rahma. Walaupun begitu, Rahma tetap hormat kepada ayahnnya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep11
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Crime Kings
programme.desc: Seorang budak kaya-pergi-penyangak bertindak sebagai Robin Hood dalam kehidupan sebenar. Melindungi orang kaya, melindungi orang miskin, bermain permainan kucing-dan-tikus dengan polis tempatan, dalam karya zaman penuh aksi ini yang diilhamkan oleh kisah benar dari Thailand 1940-an.

programme.title: Rama-Rama
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Sahira, yang hidupnya terkongkong dalam mengejar ilmu keduniaan. Sahira tidak berpeluang untuk hidup bersosial dengan rakan sebaya. Adakah Sahira akan terus dikongkong?

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep3
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: My Illegal Wife
programme.desc: Clarise mahukan suami dan cuba memikat Henry di dalam kapal terbang tetapi sia-sia. Namun, apabila pesawat itu terhempas di sebuah pulau, Henry hilang ingatan. Jadi, Clarise memutuskan untuk menggunakan amnesianya untuk kelebihannya.

programme.title: Tmo Dari Kerana Mata
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Dari Kerana Mata

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep12
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Bob Punya Baby
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki dan seorang wanita masing-masing memalsukan profail mereka dengan menggunakan gambar orang lain dan nama samaran untuk profail facebook mereka

programme.title: Khalifahkah Aku
programme.desc: Kisah Fatah anak kepada Datuk Amran dan Datin Marissa. Kedua-dua ibu bapanya sibuk dengan urusan dunia dan kerap alpa dalam urusan ibadat seharian. Mereka menghantar Fatah belajar di sekolah agama dengan harapan dia menjadi anak yang soleh.

programme.title: Kekuatan Doa Istri Solehah
programme.desc: Siapa sangka seorang suami yang diharapkan dapat menjadi imam keluarga justeru bertindak sesuka hati, mendera isterinya.

programme.title: Variety Jom Wayang S13 Ep9
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep3
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Finally Found Someone
programme.desc: Aprilyn, seorang wanita muda, kecewa apabila tunangnya meninggalkannya di altar. Kemudian, dia bertemu dengan Raffy, seorang lelaki yang cuba membantunya pulih daripada kesedihannya.

programme.title: Sir Sa
programme.desc: Satu lagi kisah cinta segi tiga berlaku di kalangan kawan rapat yang jatuh cinta dengan gadis yang sama. Cerita itu bertukar atas dan ke bawah dengan ketawa dan kegembiraan, tetapi adakah salah satu daripada mereka akan mendapat pengakhiran yang bahagia

programme.title: Crime Kings
programme.desc: Seorang budak kaya-pergi-penyangak bertindak sebagai Robin Hood dalam kehidupan sebenar. programme.title: Tmo Dari Kerana Mata

programme.title: Bimbing Aku Baca Salawat Bu
programme.desc: Sejak berkenalan dengan Bandi, ketua geng motosikal, Hidup Anisa menjadi kucar-kacir. Dia sering ponteng sekolah, tidak mahu lagi membantu ibunya, malah tidak pernah mengaji Al-Quran lagi. Rupanya, Anisa telah menyertai Bandi melepak bersama rakan-rakannya daripada geng motor.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep12
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Takkan Gentar
programme.desc: Takkan Gentar mengisahkan tentang Omar Ali, seorang jurulatih kampung yang gigih mengilap bakat pelajar OKU (disleksia) iaitu Ibrahim yang menjadi atlet sekolah hingga ke kebangsaan. Setiap hari Omar akan berulang-alik menjemput Ibrahim untuk berlatih berlari.

programme.title: Tourguide Setengah Cinta
programme.desc: Tertekan dengan kerja di Jakarta, Monic (Masayu Clara) memilih untuk berehat dengan bercuti ke kampung. Tetapi ternyata Andra (Qausar Harta Yudana) adalah pemandu pelancong. Mengapa pemandu pelancong ini sangat kucar-kacir?

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Larian Terakhir
programme.desc: Haziq, seorang anak tunggal kepada Mariam yang mempunyai bakat dalam larian pantas, sering berhadapan dengan dugaan kehidupan sehinggakan dia terpaksa meninggalkan ibunya yang sakit. Tanpa disedarinya, pertemuannya dengan Jalal telah memerangkapnya dalam sebuah sindiket jenayah. Walaupun Haziq dijanjikan peluang untuk memperbaiki hidupnya, Amelia sentiasa mengawasi setiap pergerakannya dengan teliti. Larian Terakhir adalah sebuah filem yang menggabungkan genre aksi dan sukan dengan penampilan pelakon-pelakon seperti Fattah Amin, Amyra Rosli, dan Fahrin Ahmad, di mana setiap larian akan sampai ke kemuncaknya.

programme.title: Nothing Can Stop
programme.desc: Ini adalah kisah dua geng remaja yang kaya, Rama-rama dan Scorpions. Kedua-dua kumpulan saingan itu sentiasa bersaing dalam perlumbaan kereta. Mereka daripada keluarga kaya tetapi tidak lama kemudian mereka menyedari bahawa kehidupan di luar rumah mereka tidak selalunya mudah dan penuh dengan kekecewaan.

programme.desc: Bagas mengamalkan ilmu hitam berbahaya yang dipanggil parakang. Bapa mertuanya, Rusman, menembaknya dalam usaha untuk mengelakkan lebih banyak korban. Pada masa yang sama, Elena, seorang wartawan dengan deria keenam, melihat seorang kanak-kanak mewarisi parakang.

programme.title: I Miss You
programme.desc: Bee jatuh cinta dengan rakan sekerja pakar bedah kanannya. Tetapi teman wanitanya yang baru-baru ini meninggal dunia dalam kemalangan masih belum bersedia untuk menyerahkannya lagi.

programme.title: Talk Back And You'Re Dead
programme.desc: Samantha, seorang wanita yang bijak tetapi naif, jatuh cinta dengan Top, seorang delinkuen panas kepala yang mengetuai kumpulan Lucky 13, dan tertanya-tanya jika hubungan mereka akan kekal.

programme.title: Ara
programme.desc: Ara merupakan personaliti TV dibawa kekasihnya Arman bertemu bakal mertuanya, Pn Adibah. Kewujudan anak kecil di rumah Ara membuka peluang kepada Raudah, pembantu peribadi Pn Adibah untuk merampas Arman. Apakah kesudahannya?

programme.title: Jalan Balik Surau
programme.desc: Ezad dan Yana terpaksa menghabiskan cuti sekolahnya di kampung. Ketika disana mereka mendapati terdapat sesuatu di sebalik surau Kampung Kemenyan?

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep13
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Indera Ke Enam
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang sorang ibu bernama Merry yang memiliki indra ke enam dan dapat berkomunikasi dengan dunia lain

programme.title: Bob Punya Baby
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki dan seorang wanita masing-masing memalsukan profail mereka dengan menggunakan gambar orang lain dan nama samaran untuk profail facebook mereka

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep10
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: Gembira Waktu Siang Ep10
programme.desc: Gembira Waktu Siang (disingkat GWS) merupakan sebuah rancangan hiburan yang berkongsi kegembiraan menerusi beberapa segmen yang segar dan unik. Program ini dihoskan oleh Raffi Ahmad, Vega Darwanti, Prinsa Mandagie, Mandala Shoji, dan Jirayut.

programme.title: Ado Gawe Ep16
programme.desc: Program separa dokumentari yang menjemput anda untuk meneroka destinasi unik, menikmati pelbagai masakan dan mengalami budaya yang menarik. Temui tarikan menawan di Palembang, yang dikenali sebagai Venice dari Timur.

programme.title: Mendadak Tenar Sungguh di Luar Nalar
programme.desc: Berawal dengan Nina, penjual seblak. Wajah pemilik kedai seblak ini sangat mirip bahkan seakan-akan kembar dengan Tasya, seorang artis terkenal. Hingga akhirnya, Bryan, yang merupakan pengurus Tasya, bertemu secara tidak sengaja dengan Tasya.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV 33 Ep16
programme.desc: Setiap tahun, karnival SCTV mempunyai tema yang berbeza. Karnival ini menyajikan acara muzik yang paling menarik dan menampilkan ramai musikus serta selebriti terkemuka tanah air.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Starla menyangka dia telah menghadapi segalanya, tetapi penipuan Niko jauh lebih mendalam daripada yang disangkanya. Ketika dia terus berusaha mempertahankan perkahwinannya, ancaman baharu muncul. Ayu, yang masih taksub dengan Niko, semakin mengikatnya dalam perangkap dengan menggunakan anak mereka yang belum lahir sebagai umpan. Pada masa yang sama, naluri Starla merasakan ada sesuatu yang tidak kena, dan dia mula diburu oleh bayang-bayang serta rahsia gelap. Dengan keluarganya di ambang bahaya dan emosinya semakin tertekan, adakah Starla mampu melindungi orang-orang tersayang? Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.title: Ado Gawe Ep17
programme.desc: Program separa dokumentari yang menjemput anda untuk meneroka destinasi unik, menikmati pelbagai masakan dan mengalami budaya yang menarik. Temui tarikan menawan di Palembang, yang dikenali sebagai Venice dari Timur.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep106
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Mak Comblang Cantiknya Terlalu ke Selatan
programme.desc: Rere dan Farhan adalah agen biro jodoh yang bertugas mencari jodoh untuk ramai orang. Farhan sudah sering berjaya dalam tugasnya, manakala Rere belum pernah berjaya sama sekali. Persaingan antara mereka sangat sengit. Hingga suatu malam, Rere bertekad untuk mencuri buku yang dimiliki Farhan. Dia berjaya mencuri buku tersebut dan menukarnya dengan buku lain.

programme.title: D'Koplo Ep13
programme.desc: D'Koplo (Musim 1) merupakan persembahan bakat nyanyian koplo dangdut pertama dari D'Koplo 2023. Juri utama musim ini terdiri daripada Soimah, Nassar, Dewi Perssik, dan Nita Thalia. Ada juga beberapa juri jempotan yang akan hadir.

programme.title: Ditto
programme.desc: A voice from the future echoes through an antique radio connects the two living 20 years apart and changed Yong's life forever.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the ChinaNorth Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: 12.12: The Day
programme.desc: Based on the 12.12 Military Insurrection. Chun Doo-Gwang staged a coup. Lee Tae-Shin is a commander who fights against Chun. The chaos led Seoul to an unexpected direction.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 2. The Other One
programme.desc: A mysterious girl survived a blood raid in a secret lab found herself being tracked down by a group of assassins.

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: An unusual family is born as two ruthless loan sharks take in a little girl as collateral for unpaid debts.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: An old huntsman risks his life to protect a village girl from a group of treasure hunters after they witness the men commit murder.

programme.title: The Point Men
programme.desc: A diplomat and an National Intelligence Service agent headed to Afghanistan to save South Korean missionaries captured by Taliban. They only have 24 hours...

programme.title: My Perfect Roommate
programme.desc: Living with strangers becomes even more challenging when it comes to 70-year-old lady and young college boy.

programme.title: The Swordsman
programme.desc: Joseons greatest swordsman went hiding after the fall of King Gwanghae. When his daughter is taken hostage by a Qing envoy, he has no choice but to raise his sword again to rescue her.

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Evil
programme.desc: A detective must untangle past mistakes to figure out why he was targeted at the first place and becomes the murderer of a taxi driver.

programme.title: Steel Rain: Summit
programme.desc: A peace summit for Korea is derailed when the leaders of South Korea, North Korea and the U.S. are abducted by North Korean hardliners and held hostage in a submarine.

programme.title: Deep Trap
programme.desc: A couple travel to a remote island for a restaurant famous online, yet unexpected danger awaits when they met the restaurant owner.

programme.title: South Bound
programme.desc: Choi Hae-gap has a family who will stand by his decisions given any scenario. As a team, they fight the government's plans to build a resort on the island of their ancestors.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A rock climber tries to save the day after a mad scientist releases a toxic gas that leaves thousands stranded in skyscrapers in Seoul district.

programme.title: Lovers Vanished
programme.desc: Falsely accused of killing his wife and sentenced to life, Soo-In escaped from the prison and fall in love with bar owner Mi-Ya. Yet their love seems destined to lead to heartbreak...

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left buried in the deep sea to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: Men Of Plastic
programme.desc: A natural-born networker spot potential for business when he met a top plastic surgeon by chance. Together, they decided to open a whole new era of Apgujeong.

programme.title: A Werewolf Boy
programme.desc: A girl is sent to a country house for her health, where she befriends and attempts to civilize a feral boy she discovers on the grounds - but the beast inside him is constantly waiting to burst out.

programme.title: Sori: Voice From The Heart
programme.desc: A father searching for his missing daughter finds a satellite that remembers sounds from across the world. Using his daughter's voice as a beacon, the satellite helps him track her down.

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: Yeo-Ri has the ability to see ghosts. When she joins Jo-Goo's magic show, he offers to help her find a way out before the ghosts can chase him out of her life.

programme.title: Herb
programme.desc: A 20-year-old woman with mild mental disorder falls in love with a policeman but must face heartbreak when she is forced to deal with certain realities about herself and those around her.

programme.title: One Day
programme.desc: A newly widowed insurance examiner takes on a case involving a woman in a coma. At the hospital, he encounters her spirit and realizes he is the only one that can see her.

programme.title: Following
programme.desc: Real estate agent Jung-Tae has a penchant for spying. He discovers the death of the social media star So-Ra. He is falsely accused of murder and is determined to find the real culprit.

programme.title: Homme Fatale
programme.desc: A lovely young man becomes the first male gisaeng in Joseon to help his mothers failing business. Until one day, a flower-like woman walks into his life and changes everything

programme.desc: The program has been refreshed and upgraded, departing from its initial structure. The topic of the show is "Listening to the Voice of the World, Singing With Legends." programme.title: Yi Lu Xiang Qian Ep15

programme.title: Nostalgia Ep24
programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling. In this show, the audience can enjoy the natural and cultural backgrounds of Chinese traditional villages, and will find their knowledge of this oriental country expand through the interviews of Chinese people overseas whose memory and nostalgia can also reveal the very core value of the Chinese traditional culture.

programme.title: Yi Lu Xiang Qian Ep25
programme.desc: The play tells the story of the pioneer company commander Luo Xiangqian who led his soldiers to build roadbeds, resist enemy sabotage, overcome technical and conditional difficulties, open roads over mountains, build bridges when encountering water, move forward without fear of hardship, and thus complete the Chengdu-Chongqing Railway.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep188
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5011
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1970
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3927
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep253
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2278
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep191
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5014
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Everything is Unknown
programme.desc: Pan Yi Ming receives his father's will stating that he must attend his funeral at home to claim the huge inheritance. When he returns home, he encounters his ex-girlfriend, her husband Hua Qi and his daughter whom he has never met. When Pan discovers that his daughter is being abused by Hua, he vows to save her but eventually fall into their trap

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Longs daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity

programme.title: As It Burns
programme.desc: Detective Wei investigates the death of Yan Zhen in an explosion which seems more than an accident to him. Wei then finds out that Yan Zhen looks a lot like Yin, the girlfriend of Yan Zhens childhood friend Lu, and uncovers a tangled web of deceit leading to surprising revelations when he merges details from the past and the present.

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddys lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: Break Up Club
programme.desc: Joe (Jaycee Chan) is a 20-something slacker who only takes one thing seriously: his on-and-off girlfriend Flora (Fiona Sit). After their latest breakup, Joe goes to an audition for a documentary by director Barbara Wong (the director, playing herself). Handed a camera, Joe records his discovery of a magical website that reunites him with Flora at the price of breaking up his best friend (Patrick Tang) and his girlfriend. However, despite the efficiency of the website, Joe's refusal to change his immature ways and Flora's attraction to a talented graffiti artist (Hayama Hiro) threatens to break them up once more.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from real events. Detective Lin sets up a special unit to arrest the motorbike robber and the crime syndicate behind the thefts in Foshan. In the process, his pregnant wife is hit by a motorbike robber, leading him to uncover their revenge plan...

programme.title: Tainted Love
programme.desc: Office lady Zhou Ran falls victim to an online dating love scam and is cheated of 550,000 yuan. Following faint clues left by the scammer, Zhou Ran comes to a small coastal town and encounters two young men. She gradually discovers that these two men have hidden the clues of the scam, and sets out on her revenge plan.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her teams performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chans help.

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the polices only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: In Broad Daylight
programme.desc: Based on a true event of a news investigative unit receiving a tip-off about the abuse of residents in an Elderly and Disabled Care Home. To expose the homes wrongdoings, reporter Kay goes undercover to expose the inhumanity and unveil the cruel truth under broad daylight.

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the faade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: This dark comedy begins with an unidentified corpse appearing at the doorstep of a residential flat. Fearing that the corpse will turn their flats into "haunted flats", which will cause a drastic drop in the property value, the four families living on the same floor attempt to move the corpse away, embroiling themselves in chaos.

programme.title: The Monkey King 2
programme.desc: Monkey King is tasked with escorting Monk Tang on his journey to the West to retrieve the scriptures. During the trip, Monk Tang is being targeted by the seductive yet deadly White Bone Spirit, who feeds on the innocents to gain immortality. Monkey King will have to fight the White Bone Spirit in order to save Monk Tang!

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chefs delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yong Zhen moves to Shanghai in the hope of becoming rich but ends up having to use his kung fu skills to survive and take revenge against the gang who killed his brother.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: Imprisoned 2: There Is No Escape From Fate
programme.desc: Hong Kong businessman Yu and his secretary travel abroad for business meetings. When the secretary is killed in their hotel, Yu is arrested. Despite pleading not guilty, Yu is imprisoned in a cruel multinational prison where the warden enjoys torturing prisoners, and he must find a way to escape from this dark and deadly prison to survive.

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas pursuit.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them; he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: Demon of the Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: Call to Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandits camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leaders wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Sword Stained with Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from Jin Yongs novel, the movie depicts the havoc breaking out in the martial arts world when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, a training manual, a treasure map and a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Lin and his two friends are traveling patriots who vow to stand up against violence and fight for justice. They meet a rich young man Chu by chance one day and the four become best friends. When a foreign prince plots to possess Chus family fortune and goes after him, Lin and friends go all out to help Chu fight against the villain.

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this young auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: To Kill a Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kams empire.

programme.title: Woman of the Night
programme.desc: The movie offers three stories of love and obsession. In the first tale, a young student with a voyeuristic habit spies on two of his female roommates. The second story follows an office manager who develops an infatuation for his secretary. The last story is a complex family drama about a debilitated father who forces his family to leave him.

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the Tsai Li Fu style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: The Crimson Charm
programme.desc: In attempting to rescue some innocent people, swordsman Chiang Tzu-chao (Fang Mien) slays the son of Tsao Kang (Wang Hsia), leader of the ruthless Crimson Charm gang.The enraged father promises vengeance on the day of Chiang's 60th birthday...

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: Legend of the Bat
programme.desc: It is rumoured that people can buy anything they desire on the mysterious Island of Bats so long as they have money. The charismatic swordsman Chu Liu Xiang and his friend travel to the island to seek answers but realize they are not the only ones who want to unveil the mystery of this place.

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: As more people are learning martial arts from Shaolin, the Qing court orders for it to be banned and plans to destroy the temple. The Shaolin disciples decide to take their protest to the streets, using Shaolin skills to curb their hatred, but when the Qing troops start attacking Shaolin Temple, the disciples vow to protect it at all costs.

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and causes her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep57
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham Society encounter several adventures and misadventures as they navigate the ups and downs of life and overcome their struggles together in this animated series.

programme.title: Dil Ka Rishta
programme.desc: Jai, a multimillionaire, is secretly in love with Tia whose husband he kills unintentionally while driving. After she loses her memory in the accident, she eventually falls for a guilt-ridden Jai.

programme.desc: In a bid to save his best friend's son Anwar, hostel warden Kaali goes against local goons. However, everything goes haywire when he is forced to face his past.

programme.title: Force 2
programme.desc: ACP Yashwardhan, a dutiful and honest police officer, teams up with RAW agent Kamaljit Kaur to expose an inside informer who leaks sensitive information to a foreign agency targeting the RAW agents.

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: What if, in the wake of more than a decade of devastating weather events, we finally found a way to control Mother Nature and the destruction her tirades entail? When catastrophic climate change endangers Earths very survival, world governments unite and create Project Dutch Boy: a global net of satellites surrounding the planet that are armed with geo-engineering technologies designed to stave off the natural disasters. After successfully protecting the planet for two years, something is starting to go wrong. Two estranged brothers (Gerard Butler, Jim Sturgess) are tasked with solving the programs malfunction before a worldwide geostorm can engulf the planet.

programme.title: Accused S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Val's Story - Based on the BBC's BAFTA-winning crime anthology, Accused opens in a courtroom on the accused, with viewers knowing nothing about their crime or how they ended up on trial. Told from the defendant's point of view through flashbacks, this series holds a mirror up to the current times with evocative and emotional stories. In Accused, viewers discover how an ordinary person gets caught up in an extraordinary situation, ultimately revealing how one wrong turn leads to another, until it's too late to turn back.

programme.title: Deadline Ep1
programme.desc: James Alden is a washed-up journalist making trashy documentaries when he lands the interview of the decade. Natalie Varga is suspected of murdering her rich Hungarian husband and she makes James an offer - find the killer and she'll give him the exclusive everyone wants.

programme.title: Deadline Ep2
programme.desc: Oliver went on the run after borrowing from drug dealers in Budapest. Mrs Molnar provides a Hungarian police file which implicates him in another murder attempt. He's officially dead from a drugs overdose and their mother identified the body.

programme.title: Deadline Ep3
programme.desc: James has a terrifying flight to Budapest where he discovers it's very easy to kill someone on a plane. He manages to evade Toth and Barbara joins him to track down Vera. Vera denies knowing Oliver is alive and threatens to report them for harassment.

programme.title: Deadline Ep4
programme.desc: James returns to London to pursue the killer but Barbara has fired him from his job and no-one believes his stories of what happened in Budapest. When he refuses to drop the case the police arrest him.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S5 Ep19

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S5 Ep20
programme.desc: The Big Squeeze - Magnum and Higgins take a major step forward in their relationship. At the same time, the past comes back to haunt them when a previous suspect becomes their client. TC aims to scale up Island Hoppers. Rick gets a new business partner.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: A pampered actor and his co-stars become part of a real war in a Southeast Asian jungle.

programme.title: Next Level Chef S3 Ep2

programme.title: The Water Horse
programme.desc: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend.

programme.title: DOA: Dead Or Alive
programme.desc: The plot revolves around four female fighters who begin as rivals, but subsequently find themselves teaming up against another force.

programme.title: Avengers Confidential: Black Widow & Punisher
programme.desc: The Punisher teams up with Black Widow on a high-stakes mission to stop Leviathan, a terrorist organization, from selling stolen S.H.I.E.L.D. technology to the highest bidder, saving the world and the Avengers.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Battle For The Heartfire
programme.desc: Drago, a dragon who shares his heart with the king of Brittania, must find an heir to the throne when the king passes. But the potential heirs use their inherited dragon strength and fire power against each other to vie for the throne.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a rich, spoiled playboy who has been happy to maintain a direction-less existence. When his father James Reid dies, Britt meets an impressive and resourceful company employee, Kato.

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: When retired CIA agent finds himself the target of a deadly assassin he reaches out to his old work friends in a bid to learn the truth while staying out of the mysterious enemy's clutches.

programme.title: Red 2
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Frank Moses and his team of hapless heroes return for another risky mission - this time tasked with finding a dangerous nuclear weapon. The team embark on a perilous journey to Europe pursued by deadly terrorists and government officials.

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: Ex-soldier Joseph Smith comes home from war but has been left disturbed by his experiences. Despite his intentions to start a new life, he becomes caught up in the criminal underworld, where he plots revenge on his friend's killer.

programme.title: War
programme.desc: After his partner Tom Wynne and familyare killed by the infamousand elusive assassin Rogue (Jet Li), FBI agent Jack Crawford (Jason Statham) becomes obsessedwith revenge as his world unravels into a vortex of guilt and betrayal.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Tom Hanks reprises his role as Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon, who once again finds that forces with ancient roots are willing to stop at nothing, even murder, to advance their goals.

programme.title: Scream 4
programme.desc: Neve Campbell, Courtney Cox, and David Arquette resurrect their famous roles in this spine-chilling sequel. Ghostface returns to Woodsboro but its a new decade, with new rules.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: K, an officer with the Los Angeles Police Department, unearths a secret that could create chaos. He goes in search of a former blade runner who has been missing for over three decades.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Oscar winner Peter Jackson directs Naomi Watts, Jack Black and Adrien Brody in this cinematic vision filled with non-stop action, terrifying creatures and groundbreaking special effects.

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.title: The Water Horse
programme.desc: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend.

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: In the 25th century, a virus has decimated mankind. Political conflicts, though, have taken their toll. Into this setting, acrobatic assassin Aeon Flux makes a dangerous trek to take out the government's top leader.

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: A tortured superhero crash-lands in Sheepshead Bay, Brooklyn, and tries to revitalize himself by romancing an alluring housewife, causing chaos in the city.

programme.title: Avengers Confidential: Black Widow & Punisher
programme.desc: The Punisher teams up with Black Widow on a high-stakes mission to stop Leviathan, a terrorist organization, from selling stolen S.H.I.E.L.D. technology to the highest bidder, saving the world and the Avengers.

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous
programme.desc: Joe (Nicolas Cage) is a career assassin who is in Bangkok to handle a contract, when he finds himself unexpectedly training a young protg and falling for a woman who has no knowledge of his true vocation.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York
programme.desc: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

programme.title: Avengers Confidential: Black Widow & Punisher
programme.desc: The Punisher teams up with Black Widow on a high-stakes mission to stop Leviathan, a terrorist organization, from selling stolen S.H.I.E.L.D. technology to the highest bidder, saving the world and the Avengers.

programme.title: Red 2
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Frank Moses and his team of hapless heroes return for another risky mission - this time tasked with finding a dangerous nuclear weapon. The team embark on a perilous journey to Europe pursued by deadly terrorists and government officials.

programme.title: Iron Man: Rise Of Technovore
programme.desc: When a young terrorist named Ezekiel Stane attacks Starks Industries with a lethal biotechnology that threatens to destroy the world, it is up to IRON MAN to hunt down Stane and his bio-enhanced monsters known as Technovores.

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: A commando colonel leads a covert mission to rescue kidnapped relief workers from a psychotic warlord.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

programme.title: Nim's Island
programme.desc: Nim is adventure author Alex Rovers number one fan and she lives on an isolated island with her scientist father. When her father is lost at sea and the island is being invaded, she convinces the agoraphobic and a germaphobe author to come and help.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Ayrshire - Kate walks a rugged and scenic route along Ayrshire's coast, the birthplace of Scotland's National Bard, poet Robert Burns. Less than an hour from Glasgow, this corner of southeast Scotland is rich in history and pristine wilderness.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet S1 Ep2

programme.title: Whale with Steve Backshall S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Steve Backshall explores the evolving understanding of whales, how much they have in common with humans, and how recent discoveries could help to better protect them from threats in an increasingly changing world.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S10 Ep4
programme.desc: Shadow Dwellers - With winter tightening its grip, Alaskans buckle down and ready themselves for the long months ahead.

programme.title: Changing Planet S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Six presenters chart the fight to save the planet's endangered ecosystems. Gordon Buchanan returns to Brazil, Ella Al-Shamahi to Cambodia and Ade Adepitan to Kenya.

programme.desc: Cuba - Alongside Cuban fishermen Robson searches for sardines, tarpons, bonefish, barracudas and grouper fish.

programme.desc: In Hong Kong, an old WII detention centre is transformed into a gleaming new university, while respecting the old buildings beneath. And in Wisconsin, USA, and old polluting power station is stripped down and re-engineered into a spacious student facility.
