programme.desc: India and the Maldives - Heading across to India and the Maldives, Robson fishes for frogfish, manta rays, groupers and others with the help of local anglers.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway 1 - Food, Glorious Food Ep1
programme.desc: Embark on a dangerous tagging mission in South Australia that will show what sharks eat and why they gather in feeding hot spots. Then head north as a team chases tiger, bull, and hammerhead sharks and outfits one with a 360-degree dorsal camera.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - A New Zealand Christmas Ep3
programme.desc: See how one animal familys tragedy is anothers holiday dinner as New Zealands mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day Ep4
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Boss Shark
programme.desc: Witness the ultimate battle for dominance as scientists try to pick out the alpha male in a pack of 100-plus great white sharks off the New Zealand coast. Marvel at the speed, hunting prowess, and fearlessness that determine the leader of the pack.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Behind the Lens Ep3
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Macaque Island 1 - The Young Up-Start Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the lush treed cityscape where fluffy male Matnoor rules over the 30-member-strong Street Troop with an iron fist. Then meet Aarav, the old alpha who oversees the wilder Hill Troop. Which will up-and-comer Loci challenge for the crown?

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Seasonal Ep2
programme.desc: Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - A New Zealand Christmas Ep3
programme.desc: See how one animal familys tragedy is anothers holiday dinner as New Zealands mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Waterhole Ep1
programme.desc: Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals 1 - The Queen is Back Ep4

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Cold-Blooded Killers Ep4
programme.desc: From our point of view, cold-blooded predators are brutal, savvy, programmed killers. But from their point of view, its just another day at the butchers counter. These are some of the most fearsome predators on Earth.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Behind the Lens Ep3
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 3 - Kimba's Rise Ep1
programme.desc: While the dominant males roam nearby territories, hunting duties fall to the Mwamba prides nine strong lionesses. See how they cope with the approach of the rainy season and six growing teenagers with boundless appetites.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Heat Ep3
programme.desc: Go to extremes, from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter in caves with chimps, see camels sip salt water, and listen as zebra finches sing to their eggs to make their chicks smaller.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Ice Ep4
programme.desc: Trek to the planets quickly melting poles, where animals are giving scientists clues about our future existence. Learn how the movements of polar bears, penguins, and other arctic creatures could help humans map (and prevent) global warming.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Water Worlds Ep3
programme.desc: Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway 1 - Love Bites Ep2
programme.desc: Track a pregnant shark along the Great Barrier Reef and see if she leads a team of scientists to her hidden pupping ground. Then search for signs of mating along the southern coast that could reveal a very shy female megashark in search of a partner.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 3 - Prides and Prejudice Ep2
programme.desc: As the lionesses set out to recover the males who are needed to hunt buffalo, they must cross a crocodile-infested river. Follow Milo, the only cub in the mighty Mwamba pride, as hes saved from snapping jaws and cements the familys future.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Class Reunion Ep2
programme.desc: Follow new graduate Beni, who gets an exciting introduction to jungle college alongside former classmates Sura, Meryl, and Wine. Check on new arrival Molly and join Dr. Nadine as she grades slowpoke Bumi and wild child Monita on their latest lessons.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Hard Lessons Ep3
programme.desc: Shudder as food-obsessed Beni gets a dramatic, educational smackdown from the local dominant male, Petruk. See spoiled rich kid Spanser, a former illegal pet, try to tamp down his sweet tooth before roguish Bumi goes on a wild joyride with Greta.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Mountains Ep4
programme.desc: Climb into a realm of thin air and towering rock. Tag along as mythical monkeys battle for a winter food stash, sing along with lemurs in a fruit-filled tree canopy, and watch an aromatic tree bring together blossom and possum in a moonlit tryst.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway 1 - Into the Darkness Ep3
programme.desc: Stay up late as the northern team attaches an activity tag to a bull shark and finds out what this night owl does after sunset. Then dive 80 meters deep with the southern team, who are hoping to put a satellite tracker on a female great white.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep70
programme.desc: One Tricked Pony - An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, Bridges Aflame. Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep71
programme.desc: Federal Slumber Party - Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, hes applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Babys cover at stake, its up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep42
programme.desc: The Dragon Knights Part 1 - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep43
programme.desc: The Dragon Knights Part 2 - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep34
programme.desc: The Battle of Tianshang Part 1 - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep9
programme.desc: Dragon Flower - After a visit from Trader Johan, the dragons fall mysteriously ill and Hiccup and his friends must save them.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep10
programme.desc: Heather Report Part I - Hiccup and the gang befriend a beautiful stranger who has a dangerous secret.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep1
programme.desc: How to Start a Dragon Academy - Hiccup is given the responsibility to integrate dragons into the village of Berk and must contend with his rowdy friends, unruly dragons and an upset village elder.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep49
programme.desc: Lucky and the Girl Who Cried Wolf - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep69
programme.desc: The Heat is On - On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict no-babies policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep70
programme.desc: One Tricked Pony - An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, Bridges Aflame. Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep71
programme.desc: Federal Slumber Party - Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, hes applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Babys cover at stake, its up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep42
programme.desc: The Dragon Knights Part 1 - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.desc: Family Matters - The riders realize the Flyers are using the Deathsong to capture Singetails and plan a rescue mission to liberate them

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep22
programme.desc: Dang You Saved My Life / Boovsland Noir - Sharzod hates feeling indebted to Tip after being rescued and tries to get "even"; Police King Kyle must solve the case of Sharzod's missing mojo.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep74
programme.desc: Lord Of The Fruit Flies - King Julien tries to rig an election so that Maurice becomes Mango Prime Minister but soon realizes his opponent Mort has a better shot than everyone thinks

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep48
programme.desc: The Ants And The Grasshoppers/Don't Feed The Troll - The crew teams up with grasshoppers in a fight against devious picnic ants; Turbo goes to great lengths to make somebody on the internet like him.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep48
programme.desc: Monsters & Mana - Allura and Lance walk in on Shiro, Pidge, Hunk, and Coran playing a magical role-playing board game

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep22
programme.desc: Secret Agent Sherman/Alexander Cartwright - When a special guest is revealed as the villainous Goldentoe and hijacks the show, Peabody and Sherman must find a way to escape and regain control

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep69
programme.desc: Dr Webby - Bumble's sneezing has got so bad, it is keeping everyone awake at night. Webby gives Fifi a recipe for a cure for sneezes will it work?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep70
programme.desc: Make Room For Fifi - There is a horrid smell in Fifi's garden. Fifi goes to stay with Primrose and Violet while they try and work out where the smell is coming from. What could be causing it?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep43
programme.desc: The Case Of The Flyaway Balloons - Everyone is decorating special balloons in Toyland. They're going to have a big Balloon Release at the end of the day and see how far they can fly. But when Noddy returns in the afternoon with Big Ears, the balloons have already flown away! Noddy decides to investigate. Following all the clues, he arrives at Deltoid's house. The action hero toy tells him that he only took back his specially decorated balloon. The others were still there earlier. Noddy works out that when Deltoid took his balloon, he retried the strings of the others with a knot that came undone. The balloons are flying away! Revs quickly converts to helicopter mode and Noddy is able to catch the balloons before they fly away for good. Back at Toy Green later, Deltoid is persuaded to release his balloon alongside the other balloons and this time the Balloon Release takes place without any problems at all. Well done Deltoid and well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep44
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Brick - Noddy and his friends are building a toy tower. Carlton is joining in and having a great time. They've almost finished when one of the brick pieces goes missing! Oh no. How can they finish the tower without the last brick? Noddy needs to investigate. Using his detecting skills Noddy soon finds the missing brick. But when he gets back to the Toy Green to finish the tower, he discovers that another brick has gone missing! What's going on? This investigation is really complicated! Noddy works out that the bricks were taken by Carlton. The big cat admits that he was having so much fun playing that he didn't want the game to end! Everyone forgives him and they decide to carry on playing all afternoon, all thanks to Noddy! Well done!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep43
programme.desc: Why Guinea Fowl Has Dots - You see there was a time when Guinea Fowl didn't have dots. She was an adventurous bird and loved to discover things. One day Tortoise challenges her to find out why the top of Mount Tinga Tinga shines. Guinea Fowl can't resist and races off, over the desert, past the ocean, up to the very top of Mount Tinga Tinga where she does indeed discover why the top of Mount Tinga Tinga shines.... SNOW! Guinea Fowl is the first ever animal to see snow! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep44
programme.desc: Why Buffalo Has Horns - You see there was a time when Buffalo didn't have horns. He had very long shaggy hair and he lived near the Swamp. But then one day the Swamp moves and Buffalo has to find a new home! The Swamp grows and grows and soon all the horned animals who live on the Plains risk losing their home too. So Buffalo decides to save the day and push back the muddy swamp. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep43
programme.desc: Big Chris' Big Jump - Big Chris has agreed to do a parachute jump for charity but loses his nerve on the big day. Can Roary talk him through it, just like Big Chris did for him when he got scared?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep44
programme.desc: Brassless Bandfinal - The brass band booked for the Silver Hatch parade have cancelled. Mr Carburettor will be furious if he doesn't have music at his parade. Roary and his friends think up an ingenious plan...

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep12
programme.desc: Furious Fun - The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! Ep34
programme.desc: Bites, Camera, Action! / Stay, Dog. Stay! - When Tag finds out that Pawston has a chance to host the Dogcathalon Race, she and Scooch rush around to create a movie to show why their city should host. Unfortunately everything seems to go wrong. Will Tag and Scooch be able to save their movie before time runs out? / When Tag's construction project accidentally damages Frank and Beans house, she invites them to stay with her family during repairs. Tag does her best to keep Frank and Beans busy so they dont get in the Barkers way.

programme.title: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays Ep1
programme.desc: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays - Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.title: SPIRIT OF CHRISTMAS (RIDING FREE) Ep1
programme.desc: Spirit Of Christmas - Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus Ep1
programme.desc: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus - When Boss Baby accidentally gets mistaken for an elf and sent to the North Pole on Christmas Eve, he mobilizes unpaid elf workers against an old nemesis: that charity-loving hippie people call Santa Claus. Meanwhile, Tim races to the North Pole to get his baby brother back home in time for Templeton Family Christmas traditions.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas Special - George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvins time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didnt work quite how theyd hoped. George and Harold realize they need to help Santa remember the true meaning of Christmas before its gone forever!

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos Ep1
programme.desc: Puss In Boots: The Three Diablos - After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers he is enlisted to re-steal the priceless Heart of Fire Ruby a ruby stolen by the notorious, wicked and impossible-to-hear villain, known as The Whisperer. Puss must partner with the villain's henchmen, The Three Little Kittens, to seize the ruby. Babysitting has never been more dangerous. Will our hero Puss in Boots tame the Three Diablos in time to recover the ruby?

programme.title: Far Far Away Idol Ep1
programme.desc: Far Far Away Idol - Watch your favorite Shrek characters sing the night away in this hilarious spoof. Join in the fun as Fiona, Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away Kingdom battle it out in a singer's showdown.

programme.title: Scared Shrekless Ep1
programme.desc: Scared Shrekless - Shrek gets in the Halloween spirit by challenging his fairytale friends to come up with scary stories for a contest. But the gang learn that they'll have to spend the night in Lord Farquaad's haunted castle before the winner is named.

programme.title: Madly Madagascar Ep1
programme.desc: Madly Madagascar - Romance is in the air for Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman after King Julien discovers a magical perfume and takes on the role as "King of Love."

programme.title: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf Ep1
programme.desc: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf - The Three Pigs live in a house together, but Heimlich gets scared when he sees Wolf move in next door and acting strange.

programme.title: The Ghost of Lord Farquaad Ep1
programme.desc: The Ghost Of Lord Farquaad - Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey are on their way to the hotel whereShrekand Fiona will spend their honeymoon when they encounterLord Farquaad's ghost!

programme.title: Megamind: The Button of Doom Ep1
programme.desc: Megamind: The Button Of Doom - After one "button" unleashes the gigantic robot MEGA-MEGAmind on Metro City, MegaMind and Minion must rely on their old tricks to restore order.

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins from Outer Space Ep1
programme.desc: Monsters Vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins From Outer Space - Susan Murphy (a.k.a. Ginormica) and the Monsters are now working with the US government as special ops. So when an alien presence is detected in Susan's hometown of Modesto, California -- right before Halloween -- the team is dispatched to investigate. Everything appears normal, right down to the jack-o-lanterns peering out from every doorstep and windowsill. But when Halloween arrives, those innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are mutant aliens. The altered pumpkins then start to implement their fiendish plan to take over Earth. The Monsters are there to combat the mutant gourds and try to smash their wicked scheme!

It's up to the pups to restore color to Adventure Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep409
programme.desc: Pups Save Dude Ranch Danny - Daring Danny X takes his horse off the trail and ends up on a wild ride.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep210
programme.desc: The Crew And Skye Build A Mountain Lodge - Skye visits Rubble & Crew from Adventure Bay when their construction project needs some aerial support. programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Daddy Loses his Glasses - Daddy Pig is a little upset because he lost his glasses, so Peppa and George try to find them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep615
programme.desc: Pedro is Late - The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep616
programme.desc: Garden Games - Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep617
programme.desc: Going Boating - Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep166
programme.desc: The Squeaky Boots - Christopher leads the friends in a fun game of HIDE AND SEEK. But Froga soon realizes that her new boots are letting out a noisy SQEEEAK. When a pesky mosquito enters the picture and threatens to ruin the winning prize!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep167
programme.desc: The Greedy Gobbler - While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! When Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears, the friends are convinced it's the work of the GREEDY GOBBLER and the HAZELNUT PRANKSTERS.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Pizza / Bread - Tiny Chef makes pizza and learns that friendship is more important than toppings when Ruby eats all the basil! // Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Chips & Dip - Chef and Olly make French onion dip, but Chef can't stop crying from the onions!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep103
programme.desc: The Driving Force - When Starla the friendly cowgirl truck loses one of her pistons, Blaze and AJ set out to get it back. But theyll have to hurry before Crusher gets his greedy tires on it!

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Crowns & Castles / The Great Mondini - The hamsters overhear Dad role-playing as a dastardly knight and believe he has turned evil. // Mondo must choose between superhero life and saving his best friend at Harry's magic show.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1103
programme.desc: Pups Plus a Plucky Chicken / Pups Save a Pet Show - When Humdinger, intent on building the world's largest corn maze, steals Farmer Al's super-powered seeds. // Today is Adventure Bay's "Twin It To win It" pet show, where owners and their pets dress in matching outfits.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep504
programme.desc: Pups Save a High Flying Skye / Pups Go for the Gold - When Corny runs away from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups need to light the way to get them home safely! // Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a runaway mine car! Ryder and the Pups need to rescue him before it crashes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Pup and the Very Big Baby - Theres a beached baby whale in Adventure Bay! Can the Paw Patrol work together to reunite it with its mother?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep210
programme.desc: The Crew And Skye Build A Mountain Lodge - Skye visits Rubble & Crew from Adventure Bay when their construction project needs some aerial support. But when Speed Meister tries to beat the pups to finish the job, Skye, Rubble, and the rest of the crew jump into rescue mode to save the day!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Adventures In Plantsitting / Andrea the Alebrije - Dora and Boots take care of baby flowers Bouncy Blue, Dizzy Daisy, and Baby Rosette so Isa can attend a royal tea party. / Dora and Boots help baby Andrea find the magical leaf so she can receive her Alebrije powers and take care of the rainforest.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Finterstellar / Goldie's Greatest Role - Baby and Grandpa team up to win a bubble rocket competition. // Goldie puts on a play about a skatefish boarding legend and casts herself in the lead, instead of giving Vola a chance to shine.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Fins in the Water - Max is desperate for a dog, but when he finds Sharkdog while paddle boarding he gets a pet - and friend - who is way more bizarre and fun than he expected.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Home Sweet Sharkdog - Max's new best friend, Sharkdog, comes home with him, but keeping him a secret from his parents is a challenge.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Unfetch - When Sharkdog fetches items that belong to the residents of Foggy Springs, Max needs to help him return them all before anyone notices.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep618
programme.desc: Mr Bull in a China Shop - While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep619
programme.desc: Fruit - It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special 'dinosaur' juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep620
programme.desc: George's Balloon - George is finding it difficult to keep hold of his big balloon. Can anyone stop it from flying off to the moon?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Treasure - Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Pancakes / S'Mores - Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula. // Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep123
programme.desc: Barba TV / The Museum - The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep124
programme.desc: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' / The Doppelganger - Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep602
programme.desc: The Amazing Stunt Kitty - When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Darington's sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep603
programme.desc: Dino Derby - Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Day / Pups Turn on the Lights - Alex loses his back pack on the first day of school! Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to help him find it. // Its Chases birthday and the pups are planning a surprise party. A storm causes the power to go out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pool Day / Circus Pup-Formers - Its a hot day and the pups head for the water park but the pool is empty! Paw Patrol to the rescue. // When the animals dont show up in time for the Circus to start; Ryder and the Paw Patrol step in to help.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Legendary Loot / Yup Day - After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down. // Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep324
programme.desc: Paddington's Football Dilemma / Paddington Has To Say Goodbye - Paddington has to choose between England and Peru before their football cup match, but he loves both places equally! // The time has come for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still time for one last adventure, or is there?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Ants on a Log / Quesadillas - Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear! // Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favorite jar of salsa open no matter how hard he and his friends try!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password / Monday Funday - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep202
programme.desc: No Fishes in This School - It's the first day of school, and Sharkdog's not allowed to come; well, that's never stopped him before!

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Going Wild - When Sharkdog's wild side keeps scaring away the dogs at the dog park, Sharkdog must find his inner calm if he wants to make new friends.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep204
programme.desc: A Not So Grand Opening - When Sharkdog accidentally eats the aquarium's newest exhibit, Max and the Sharkpack must come up with a plan before Mr. Ceviche, the aquarium's owner, catches on.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep205
programme.desc: The Fast and The Fishy - Max is determined to win this year's obstacle course race, but that may be difficult with Sharkdog always trying to help.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1005
programme.desc: Pups Save Their Digi Tal Friends / Pups Save the Rainbow - The Paw Patrol must save the day when two helpful robots take on more than they can handle. // In a dream, Mayor Humdinger finds a Prism that makes rainbows and drains Adventure Bay of color. It's up to the pups to restore color to Adventure Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep409
programme.desc: Pups Save Dude Ranch Danny - Daring Danny X takes his horse off the trail and ends up on a wild ride.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep210
programme.desc: The Crew And Skye Build A Mountain Lodge - Skye visits Rubble & Crew from Adventure Bay when their construction project needs some aerial support. But when Speed Meister tries to beat the pups to finish the job, Skye, Rubble, and the rest of the crew jump into rescue mode to save the day!

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Adventures In Plantsitting / Andrea the Alebrije - Dora and Boots take care of baby flowers Bouncy Blue, Dizzy Daisy, and Baby Rosette so Isa can attend a royal tea party. / Dora and Boots help baby Andrea find the magical leaf so she can receive her Alebrije powers and take care of the rainforest.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale S1 Ep124
programme.desc: The Curse of the Magic Orb / The Wizard's Magic Flute - The hamsters crash Harry's school play rehearsal thinking that he is in danger. // The hamsters believe Keesha's flute is making them fall asleep and vow to stop it.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Tool Duel - Gabby is the mechanic all the Monster Machines in town count on to fix them up. But when Crusher steals all her tools, Gabby needs Blaze's help to get them back!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S8 Ep805
programme.desc: Monster Machine Rescue Team - Blaze must complete three amazing rescues to join the greatest emergency vehicle team in Axle City: the Monster Machine Rescue Team!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1104
programme.desc: Pups Save Helga and the Humsquatch / Pups Save the Missing Bone-Stone - Mayor Humdinger is getting dressed for a special day with his Hummy Mummy. // The Museum has a brand-new exhibit: the Emerald Bone-Stone! But when the precious bone goes missing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep507
programme.desc: Pups Save the Butterflies / Pups Save an Underground Chicken - Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay! // The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Pups and the Kitty-tastrophe - Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a lost kitty from the bay, but who will save them from all the mayhem she causes?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep211
programme.desc: The Crew Builds Mr. Ducky-Doo A Special Diving Board / The Crew Builds A Rainwater Tank - Mayor Greatway asks Rubble & Crew to build something special for her friend Mr. Ducky-Doo. But soon a construction mystery is afoot... // Rubble & Crew work to build a rain tank for Farmer Zoe before a storm, until a chicken complication crops up.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep209
programme.desc: Rainforest Race / Bok Bok Birthday - Dora and Boots race their boxcar against Croc Racers in the Rainforest Race. / Dora and Boots secretly hand out Big Red Chicken's birthday invites to all their friends in time for his birthday party.

programme.desc: Deep Dark Disco / Finception - The Sharks help Wavey Jones find his disco ball so he can throw a jaw-some party. // When Hank accidentally takes an important treasure from Swimmy Hall, he goes on a sneaky mission to set things right.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Sharkdoghouse - Max needs to create a permanent home for Sharkdog and he knows that his best friends, Olivia and Royce, are just the people to help him.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Sharkdog Digs In - Dad desperately wants to win Garden of the Year but when Sharkdog destroys the garden right before judging, the Sharkpack needs to step in and put it all in order.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep106
programme.desc: The Great Shark Hunter - Max needs to find more and more fishsticks to keep Sharkdog fed, but his search leads him right into the path of the increasingly suspicious Captain Barb Quigley.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep625
programme.desc: The Olden Days - Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep626
programme.desc: Snowy Mountain - Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Muddy Puddles - It's raining and Peppa is sad because she can't go out to play. When the rain stops, Peppa feels better and she and George get ready to play one of their favorite games - jumping in mud puddles!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Mr Dinosaur is Lost - George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Cranberry Cookies / Snap Pea Stir-Fry - Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood. // Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep605
programme.desc: Race to Sky High Mountain - At the starting line for Race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crusher's cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good. To get back in this race, Blaze will need... Power Tires!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep606
programme.desc: Sparkle's Racing Badge - It's more Blaze family fun in this high octane, action-packed adventure as Blaze and his sister Sparkle team up to make it back to the Monster Dome in time for a big race.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep120

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep111

programme.desc: Mac and Cheese / Potato Stew - Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! // Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep102

programme.desc: Cat - Dee encourages a friend to say 'cat' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! There's a black cat, a white cat, a kitten cat and a purring cat, as well as a very cool cat!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Snow Day - Phoebe and her friends are enjoying a Pop Paper City winter wonderland! But can Phoebe help to make a snowman before a snowstorm arrives?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep5

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep4

programme.desc: The List Badge - Duggee has lost the list he made for the Squirrel's activities for the day at Squirrel Club. After a quick lesson on what a list is, they are happy to help Duggee recreate his.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: iPS cells are being used to treat eye diseases to address donor shortages. We explore advancements made in Japan, such as the transplantation of iPS cell-derived corneal cells and retinal sheets.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth
programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Deeper Look
programme.desc: How will Trump's policies impact an already polarized nation and a chaotic international stage? Tatsumi Yuki from the Stimson Center discusses the aftermath of the US presidential election.

programme.title: Dig More Japan
programme.desc: Sacred ground to the Japanese, Wakayama Prefecture is also popular with overseas visitors. We dig a little deeper into what makes it so special.

programme.title: The Seasons Of Yamato
programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Oka Yuki uses digital technology to make tough rehabilitation programs more enjoyable for children with disabilities. He shares his vision for combining medical/welfare services with entertainment.

programme.title: Journeys In Japan
programme.desc: Along the Mogami River (Yamagata Pref.) communities keep alive traditional ways of surviving the harsh winter. On this program, get to know the real Japan and discover useful travel tips.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: Dining With The Chef
programme.desc: Chewy Japanese udon, savory and umami-rich soup, plus crispy tempura-Chef Rika shows us how to make it all. Also, master the art of making handmade udon from scratch. It's deliciously simple!

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: Document 72 Hours
programme.desc: Gum, chocolate, candy, and snacks are crammed into a penny candy shop in Akabane, Tokyo. What is the store's enduring appeal to customers of all ages? Explore the answer over three summer days.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC299OMalleyvsVera2
programme.desc: Newly crowned UFC bantamweight champion Suga Sean OMalley faces a tough challenge in his first title defense when he meets the only man to beat him, top contender Marlon Chito Vera, in the main event. Dustin Poirier takes on French phenom Benot Saint Denis in the co-main, and Michael "Venom" page makes his highly anticipated UFC debut against Kevin Holland. All this and more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep12
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep5
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC 310: Pantoja vs. Asakura
programme.desc: Prelims - In the midst of an increasingly dominant reign atop the flyweight division, Alexandre Pantoja will put his belt on the line for a third time in the main event of UFC 310 on December 8 against Japanese star Kai Asakura, who will look to shock the world by winning a UFC title in his first trip to the Octagon. Plus, a shot at the welterweight title will be up for grabs in the co-main event as unbeaten contenders Shavkat Rakhmonov and Ian Machado Garry collide at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yan vs. Figueiredo
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC returns to Macau for the first time in a decade on November 23, and fight fans in China will be treated to a highly anticipated main event as former world champions Petr Yan and Deiveson Figueiredo clash in a five-round battle that could shake up the bantamweight title picture. Brazils Figueiredo has been unstoppable since moving to 135 pounds, but to make his case for a shot at the belt, he must first vanquish Russias No Mercy Yan. Plus, Chinas own Yan Xiaonan makes her first start since her thrilling challenge for the strawweight championship when she takes on fellow 115-pound contender Tabatha Ricci.
